Posts.Content: Thanks Jantv: We were told that they are doing stage two testing on Hodgkins disease with genetic silencing with fantastic results and that when it hits stage three the FDA usually fastracks it to the public. The only drawback is that these injections have to be taken daily. Has anyone heard of this and do you know what colleges or labs are doing these tests?
Posts.Title: Genetic Silencing

Posts.Content: Has anyone heard of the new discovery regarding Genetic Silencing. Our doctor who lectures as USC Medical Center told us of a up and coming new approach to all diseases. I am looking for a government sponsored program regarding this type of testing and treatment for breast cancer that has mestasized. Please let me know if you have heard of it or know of any labs that are currently testing. Thanks and God Bless.
